response: twitter has been actively working towards protecting user's personal information since 2011. the company has made changes to their policies and processes that prioritize the security of private data. twitter also advocates for digital privacy rights and encourages users to take control over their online experience. however, there are still concerns about how social media platforms handle user data. it is important to continue advocating for data protection and educating users on best practices for online safety.<|endoftext|>
